course_title: Beyond the Diagnosis: Exploring Psychosocial & Cultural Dimensions of Disability through Health hu
course_description: This course will provide students the opportunity for deeper exploration of current psychosocial and cultural topics, with an emphasis on humanities, as it relates to rehabilitation. The overall course objective is for students to engage in dialogue and reflection over meaningful and relevant topics . The course topics were developed with an effort to promote a deep understanding & comfort level navigating potential challenges faced in the clinical world.
